entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 14.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming southeast 20 this morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
